response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for this exceptional item. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the standard price. I believe this is a fair deal that will allow you to enjoy the product's full potential while also making a smart investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
